amendment.description: Amendment sought to exempt rules that provide for reduction in the amount of lead in public drinking water.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in House Report 115-1 to exempt rules that provide for reduction in the amount of lead in public drinking water.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 231 (Roll no. 16).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A006) Failed by recorded vote: 192 - 231 (Roll no. 16).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Conyers.
